thread.title: From Rose Festival Court to death on frozen streets: Karen Batts' lonely struggle
thread.title_full: From Rose Festival Court to death on frozen streets: Karen Batts' lonely struggle

author: Molly Harbarger | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: From Rose Festival Court to death on frozen streets: Karen Batts' lonely struggle
text: Karen Lee Batts was outgoing, a junior varsity cheerleader and a contender for Grant High School's Rose Festival court. As she got older, a host of mental issues created a paradox -- just when she couldn't make good decisions, no one could help her. She died homeless and alone from exposure.
